title: Night And The City (1950, UK) Richard Widmark, Gene Tierney- Film Noir Full Movie

sources.title: Nightandthecity1950
sources.description: Night and the City is a 1950 film noir directed by Jules Dassin and starring Richard Widmark, Gene Tierney, Hugh Marlowe and Googie Withers. It is based on the novel of the same name by Gerald Kersh. Shot on location in London and at Shepperton Studios, the plot revolves around an ambitious hustler whose plans keep going wrong. Â  The film contains a very tough and prolonged fight scene between Stanislaus Zbyszko, a celebrated professional wrestler in real life, and Mike Mazurki, who before becoming an actor was himself a professional wrestler. Wikipedia: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Night_and_the_City Suggested Film Noirs: http://bit.ly/2tLevkl The Internet Archive is an excellent choice for entire full length Netflix & YouTube style uploads of drama, mystery, thriller & crime noir movies from the UK & USA for free.
